sent.trans: 嘿，让一下道，让一下道，让一下道！

sent.orig: The farthest way about is the nearest way home.
sent.trans: 遥程路反近，捷径常误人。

sent.orig: The longest way round is the nearest way home.
sent.trans: 绕远路反近，捷径常误人。

sent.orig: There is an analogy between the way water moves in waves and the way light travels.
sent.trans: 水的波动与光的运行有类似之处。

sent.orig: There is no other way than this.; This is the only way.
